brandProfile.title: HomeLoans.mx - Su Guía para Créditos Hipotecarios en México
brandProfile.brandVoice: Informative and straightforward, providing clear value propositions.
brandProfile.targetAudience: Diverse audience interested in the brand's core offerings and values.

objectives: Increase brand awareness for HomeLoans.mx in the Mexican mortgage market by 25% within 3 months.
Drive a 30% increase in qualified organic website traffic related to mortgage loans in Mexico.
Generate a minimum of 100 new leads for mortgage consultations or pre-qualification applications.
Establish HomeLoans.mx as a trusted authority and go-to resource for mortgage information in Mexico.
Improve search engine rankings for key transactional and informational mortgage-related keywords.

tasks.title: Comprehensive Keyword Research & SEO Audit
tasks.description: Conduct in-depth keyword research for 'créditos hipotecarios México', 'tasas hipotecarias', 'requisitos hipoteca', and competitor analysis. Perform a technical SEO audit of the HomeLoans.mx website to identify and fix critical issues (e.g., mobile-friendliness, site speed, broken links).

tasks.title: Artículo: 'Créditos Hipotecarios en México: Guía para Principiantes'
tasks.description: Publish a foundational article covering the basics of mortgage loans in Mexico, types of credits, and key terminology, optimized for long-tail keywords. Include clear calls to action for more information.

tasks.title: Google Search Ads Campaign: 'Créditos Hipotecarios México'
tasks.description: Launch a targeted Google Search Ads campaign focused on high-intent keywords like 'créditos hipotecarios México', 'mejor hipoteca México', 'calcular crédito hipotecario', directing traffic to optimized landing pages.

tasks.title: Video Corto: '3 Mitos Comunes sobre Créditos Hipotecarios en México'
tasks.description: Create a short (60-90 second) animated or presenter-led video debunking common myths about mortgages in Mexico, suitable for YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, and Facebook. Link to the main website for more info.

tasks.title: Social Media Presence Setup & Initial Content Plan
tasks.description: Establish and optimize profiles on key platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn). Develop a 4-week content calendar focused on educational posts, engaging questions, and promoting the initial blog post and video.

tasks.title: Artículo: 'Requisitos y Documentos Clave para Tu Crédito Hipotecario en México'
tasks.description: Publish an in-depth article detailing the specific documents and eligibility requirements for obtaining a mortgage in Mexico, providing a practical checklist and tips. Optimize for keywords like 'requisitos hipoteca', 'documentos crédito hipotecario'.

tasks.title: Video Explicativo: 'El Proceso de Solicitud de Crédito Hipotecario Paso a Paso'
tasks.description: Produce a longer-form (3-5 minute) explainer video walking potential borrowers through each stage of the mortgage application process in Mexico, from pre-qualification to closing. Host on YouTube and embed on relevant website pages.

tasks.title: Facebook/Instagram Lead Generation Ads: 'Calcula Tu Hipoteca Ideal'
tasks.description: Launch a lead generation ad campaign on Facebook and Instagram using a lead form, offering a free 'Calculadora de Crédito Hipotecario' or 'Pre-calificación Gratuita' to capture contact information.

tasks.title: Episodio de Podcast/Webinar Corto: 'Preguntas Frecuentes sobre Enganche y Gastos de Escrituración'
tasks.description: Record a short audio-only (or live webinar) session addressing common questions about down payments (enganche) and closing costs (gastos de escrituración) in Mexico. Promote on social media and the website.

tasks.title: Content Gap Analysis & On-Page SEO Optimization
tasks.description: Analyze performance of existing content and identify new content opportunities based on search queries. Optimize meta titles, descriptions, image alt text, and internal linking for top-performing and new pages.

tasks.title: Retargeting Ad Campaign: 'No Dejes Tu Sueño de Casa en Espera'
tasks.description: Set up retargeting ads on Google Display Network and social media to re-engage users who visited HomeLoans.mx but didn't convert. Offer a specific incentive like a 'Consulta Gratuita con un Experto'.

tasks.title: Artículo Comparativo: 'Mejores Bancos para Créditos Hipotecarios en México 2024'
tasks.description: Publish an in-depth comparative article analyzing different bank offerings, rates, and conditions for mortgages in Mexico, providing clear value propositions and recommendations. Update annually.

tasks.title: Webinar/Live Q&A: 'Decide Inteligentemente: Tasas Fijas vs. Variables en Tu Hipoteca'
tasks.description: Host a live webinar or interactive Q&A session with a mortgage expert to discuss the pros and cons of fixed vs. variable rates, allowing direct audience interaction. Promote extensively through email and social media.

tasks.title: Landing Page Optimization & A/B Testing
tasks.description: Conduct A/B tests on key landing pages (e.g., contact forms, pre-qualification forms) to improve conversion rates. Test headlines, CTAs, form fields, and visual elements.

tasks.title: Creación de Lead Magnet Premium: 'Ebook Gratuito: Checklist Completo para Comprar Tu Casa en México'
tasks.description: Develop a comprehensive downloadable ebook (PDF) as a lead magnet, covering the entire home-buying journey with a mortgage. Promote via website banners, blog posts, and dedicated landing pages for email capture.
